attributes.mlflow.spanInputs:
{"database_schema": ""Description for table: BridgeMessage"
type BridgeMessage implements Event @entity(immutable: true) @transaction {
  "Description for column: id"
  id: Bytes!
  "Description for column: hash"
  hash: Bytes!
  "Description for column: logIndex"
  logIndex: Int!
  "Description for column: protocol"
  protocol: BridgeProtocol!
  "Description for column: account"
  account: Account!
  "Description for column: to"
  to: Bytes!
  "Description for column: from"
  from: Bytes!
  "Description for column: isOutgoing"
  isOutgoing: Boolean!
  "Description for column: fromChainID"
  fromChainID: BigInt!
  "Description for column: toChainID"
  toChainID: BigInt!
  "Description for column: transferFrom"
  transferFrom: Bytes
  "Description for column: transferTo"
  transferTo: Bytes
  "Description for column: data"
  data: Bytes!
  "Description for column: crossTransactionID"
  crossTransactionID: Bytes
  "Description for column: blockNumber"
  blockNumber: BigInt!
  "Description for column: timestamp"
  timestamp: BigInt!
}"}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
{"documented_schema": ""Description for table: BridgeMessage"
type BridgeMessage implements Event @entity(immutable: true) @transaction {
  "Unique identifier for the bridge message"
  id: Bytes!
  "Hash of the bridge message"
  hash: Bytes!
  "Index of the log entry"
  logIndex: Int!
  "Protocol used in the bridge message"
  protocol: BridgeProtocol!
  "Account associated with the bridge message"
  account: Account!
  "Destination address"
  to: Bytes!
  "Source address"
  from: Bytes!
  "Indicates if the message is outgoing"
  isOutgoing: Boolean!
  "Chain ID of the source blockchain"
  fromChainID: BigInt!
  "Chain ID of the destination blockchain"
  toChainID: BigInt!
  "Address from which the transfer is initiated"
  transferFrom: Bytes
  "Address to which the transfer is directed"
  transferTo: Bytes
  "Additional data associated with the message"
  data: Bytes!
  "Identifier for the cross-chain transaction"
  crossTransactionID: Bytes
  "Block number in which the message was included"
  blockNumber: BigInt!
  "Timestamp of when the message was created"
  timestamp: BigInt!
}"}
